summary: This document is a Deutsche Bank alert regarding Jeffrey Epstein, highlighting his status as a registered sex offender and detailing various legal issues and allegations against him. It includes information about his addresses, criminal history, and multiple lawsuits related to sexual offenses. This document contains a critical alert from Deutsche Bank regarding Jeffrey Edward Epstein, indicating a high-risk priority associated with his financial activities. It references various media articles discussing the Epstein case and its implications, particularly focusing on public figures and legal challenges.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as a registered sex offender with a history of soliciting underage girls for prostitution and has faced numerous lawsuits related to sexual abuse.

events.title: Plea Deal
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein pleaded guilty to soliciting a minor for prostitution and was sentenced to 18 months in jail.

events.title: Served Jail Time
events.description: Epstein served 12 months for a state charge of prostitution solicitation and registered as a sex offender.

events.title: Sex Offender Registration
events.description: Epstein appeared on the New York Sex Offenders site.

events.title: Multiple Allegations
events.description: By 2011, 40 underage girls had come forward with allegations of sexual assault against Epstein.

events.title: Out-of-Court Settlements
events.description: As of May 2013, Epstein had made 17 out-of-court settlements related to sexual abuse allegations.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is a registered sex offender since 2008 after pleading guilty to soliciting prostitution.
He served 13 months in jail for procuring a minor for prostitution.
By 2011, 40 underage girls had come forward with allegations of sexual assault against him.
As of May 2013, Epstein had made 17 out-of-court settlements related to sexual abuse allegations.
The document highlights multiple legal issues and allegations against Epstein, including charges of illegal prostitution.
The alert was generated on August 17, 2018, indicating critical risk associated with Jeffrey Edward Epstein.
The document references media articles discussing Epstein's connections to various public figures and ongoing legal issues.
The alert is part of a monitoring process by Deutsche Bank regarding Epstein's financial activities.
